name: com.unity.xr.hands
description: Surfaces the cross-platform subsystem API for hand-tracking. Implementations of providers will be found in the package for that platform.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed

- Fixed some deformations in the authored hand mesh provided for Android XR development that is a part of the Hand Visualizer sample. Note: A firmware update on the Android XR devices may be required for the meshes to appear correctly since they depend on an updated hand tracking data model.

samples.description: Sample showing how to detect and debug hand gestures.
Basic sample showing how visualize hands.
